amendment.description: Amendment modifies the Truth in Lending Act to require credit card issuers to make disclosures regarding interest rates, minimum monthly payments, and late fees, and subjects worldwide web-based credit card solicitations to the same disclosures as other credit card solicitations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to modify the Truth in Lending Act to require credit card issuers to make disclosures regarding interest rates, monthly payment information, and late fees, and subjects worldwide web-based credit card solicitations to the same disclosures as other credit card solicitations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moran (VA) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
